steps.body: Learn more about the dashboard with our "Page tips."

steps.title: Welcome to your dashboard!
steps.body: Think of your dashboard as base camp -- you can create and manage assignments, see student progress, and review the book.

steps.title: Here's where you add your assignments
steps.body: Create an assignment by clicking it or dragging to the calendar.

steps.title: Managing assignments
steps.body: You can edit an assignment or review student progress and performance by clicking an assignment in your calendar.

steps.title: Here's where you see section analytics
steps.body: The Performance Forecast is the compass in your pocket: it helps you measure how your class is understanding concepts so you can target your teaching!

steps.title: View student scores
steps.body: View individual student performance and completion, and export student scores for your learning management system.

steps.title: Manage your Question Library
steps.body: View all OpenStax Tutor questions here.

steps.title: Student enrollment
steps.body: Find student access options in Course settings.

steps.title: Remember, this is a preview course
steps.body: You're in a preview course with pre-populated data. When you're done exploring the preview course, here's where you can create a real course.

steps.title: Get help
steps.body: Get help with a page tour, support articles, or live chat.
